scripts.copy-assets: shx mkdir -p dist/popup dist/icons dist/audio dist/lib && shx cp manifest.json dist/ && shx cp background.html dist/ && shx cp icons/*.png dist/icons/ && shx cp popup/popup.html dist/popup/ && shx cp popup/popup.css dist/popup/ && shx cp popup/popup-dark.css dist/popup/ && shx cp popup/neue-montreal-variable.latin.woff2 dist/popup/ && shx cp -r popup/icons dist/popup/icons && shx cp audio/notification.mp3 dist/audio/ && shx cp lib/browser-polyfill.min.js dist/lib/
